channel.title: CVE Feed for B&R Industrial Automation -- B&R APROL
channel.description: The latest CVEs for B&R Industrial Automation -- B&R APROL

item.title: CVE-2022-43764|2024-08-03T13:40:06.235Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- b%26r%20aprol
item.description: Insufficient validation of input parameters when changing configuration on Tbase server in B&R APROL versions < R 4.2-07 could result in buffer overflow. This may lead to Denial-of-Service conditions or execution of arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-43761|2024-08-03T13:40:06.403Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- b%26r%20aprol
item.description:
Missing authentication when creating and managing the B&R APROL database in versions < R 4.2-07
allows reading and changing the system configuration.

item.title: CVE-2022-43765|2024-08-03T13:40:06.375Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- b%26r%20aprol
item.description: B&R APROL versions < R 4.2-07 doesn’t process correctly specially formatted data packages sent to port 55502/tcp, which may allow a network based attacker to cause an application Denial-of-Service.

item.title: CVE-2022-43762|2024-08-03T13:40:06.241Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- b%26r%20aprol
item.description: Lack of verification in B&R APROL Tbase server versions < R 4.2-07 may lead to memory leaks when receiving messages

item.title: CVE-2022-43763|2024-08-03T13:40:06.446Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- b%26r%20aprol
item.description: Insufficient check of preconditions could lead to Denial of Service conditions when calling commands on the Tbase server of B&R APROL versions < R 4.2-07.
